title: Seth Waugh on Tiger Woods' 'Seismic' Impact on Golf
itunes:title: Seth Waugh on Tiger Woods' 'Seismic' Impact on Golf
description:
The 2021 PGA Championship tees off at Kiawah Island's windy Ocean Course. Jason, Barr, and Lynch caught up with Seth Waugh, PGA of America CEO, to chat about what to expect from the oceanfront major, the impact of a Tiger-less tournament, and why golf is the answer to the pandemic.

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
